snippet: Argentine television journalist Jorge Lanata said he and his crew were detained at the Caracas airport while Venezuelan secret service agents erased his video of the recent elections.
lead_paragraph: Argentine television journalist Jorge Lanata said he and his crew were detained at the Caracas airport while Venezuelan secret service agents erased his video of the recent elections.

headline.seo: Argentine Reporter Says Venezuelan Agents Erased Election Video
headline.main: Argentine Reporter Says Venezuelan Agents Seized Election Video
headline.print_headline: Argentine Reporter Says Venezuelan Agents Seized Video
